directions: Grind sugar for 10 seconds/speed 9 to make powdered sugar.
Add basil and grind with powdered sugar for 5 seconds/speed 9.

Clear sides of bowl with spatula and add remaining ingredients. Wait about two minutes for ice to warm slightly before proceeding. This short waiting time helps make for a smoother, more consistent result.)

Mix for about 30 seconds/speed 9 while churning with Thermomix spatula, until no cubes remain. Serve immediately as a soft sorbet in chilled double-wall glassware, or re-freeze for more solid serving later.
ingredients: 50 g. fresh basil (or frozen basil cubes)
½ – 1 lemon’s worth of zest (can be fresh or frozen)
200-250 g. frozen milk cubes (previously frozen into ice cube trays: can be coconut milk, cow, goat milk, cream, yogurt, or even ice cubes — or combination thereof)
60 g. liquid milk (any of the above, not frozen)
title: Thermomix Basil & Lemon Sorbet
